alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; North Bighorn Basin; Southeast Bighorn Basin; Southwest Bighorn Basin; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 06 at 12:34AM MDT until October 07 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 are possible. * WHERE...North Bighorn Basin, Southwest Bighorn Basin, Southeast Bighorn Basin, Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin, Lander Foothills, Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freeze products are issued until a season ending event occurs, usually as a result of a hard freeze (28 degrees). Should a season ending event occur, a Freeze Watch/Warning is no longer issued for the season.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; North Bighorn Basin; Southeast Bighorn Basin; Southwest Bighorn Basin; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
